type.description: A Microsoft SQL Server (MSSQL) database connection.

driver.description: The MSSQL driver to use (e.g., 'tedious'). Optional.

user.description: The MSSQL user to authenticate as. Optional.

password.description: The password for the MSSQL user. Optional.

server.description: The hostname or IP address of the MSSQL server.

port.description: The port number to connect to. Optional.

domain.description: The Windows domain to authenticate under. Optional.

database.description: Name of the database to use for this connection. Optional.

connectionTimeout.description: Milliseconds before a timeout occurs during initial connection. Optional

requestTimeout.description: Milliseconds before a timeout occurs during a query request. Optional.

stream.description: If true, query results are returned as a stream. Optional.

parseJSON.description: If true, automatically parses JSON columns. Optional.

arrayRowMode.description: If true, rows are returned as arrays instead of objects. Optional.
